p: Briefly, microorganisms will utilize agricultural biomass as raw materials for their growth via the fermentation processes [ 57]. Hence, the desirable effect of microbial activity in fermented feed is caused by its biochemical activity [ 58]. Those microbial enzymes will break down carbohydrates, lipids, proteins, and other feed components during the fermentation of PKC, which ultimately improves the overall PKC nutritional quality [ 12].
